term.title: hydrocarbylidene groups

item.text: Divalent groups, R2C=, formed by removing two hydrogen atoms from the same carbon atom of a hydrocarbon, the free valencies of which are engaged in a double bond.

sources.item: PAC, 1995, 67, 1307. 'Glossary of class names of organic compounds and reactivity intermediates based on structure (IUPAC Recommendations 1995)' on page 1341 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199567081307)
